languages.text: {n}При дрожащих от бешенства словах дознавателя Маражай, погрузившийся было в свои мысли, оживает: змеиным движением он поворачивает голову и вперивает немигающий взгляд в дознавателя.{/n}
{n}Marazhai, who had been engrossed in his own thoughts, springs to life at the Interrogator's frenzied words. He turns his head with snake-like grace and stares unblinkingly at Heinrix.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}При дрожащих от бешенства словах дознавателя Маражай, погрузившийся было в свои мысли, оживает: змеиным движением он поворачивает голову и вперивает немигающий взгляд в дознавателя.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, plongé jusqu'ici dans ses pensées, relève les yeux en entendant les vociférations de l'interrogateur. Il tourne la tête avec la souplesse d'un serpent et dévisage Heinrix sans ciller.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, who had been engrossed in his own thoughts, springs to life at the Interrogator's frenzied words. He turns his head with snake-like grace and stares unblinkingly at Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, plongé jusqu'ici dans ses pensées, relève les yeux en entendant les vociférations de l'interrogateur. Il tourne la tête avec la souplesse d'un serpent et dévisage Heinrix sans ciller.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋之前一直在专心思考事情。此刻，海因里希的怒吼惊得他跳了起来。他像毒蛇一样优雅地转过了头，目不转睛地盯着海因里希。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, who had been engrossed in his own thoughts, springs to life at the Interrogator's frenzied words. He turns his head with snake-like grace and stares unblinkingly at Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋之前一直在专心思考事情。此刻，海因里希的怒吼惊得他跳了起来。他像毒蛇一样优雅地转过了头，目不转睛地盯着海因里希。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}自分の考えに没頭していたマラズハイが、インテロゲイターの興奮気味な言葉でハッとしたように我に返った。蛇のように首をくねらせ、ハインリックスを瞬きもせずにじっと見ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, who had been engrossed in his own thoughts, springs to life at the Interrogator's frenzied words. He turns his head with snake-like grace and stares unblinkingly at Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}自分の考えに没頭していたマラズハイが、インテロゲイターの興奮気味な言葉でハッとしたように我に返った。蛇のように首をくねらせ、ハインリックスを瞬きもせずにじっと見ている。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, versunken in seiner eigenen Gedankenwelt, wacht durch die wütenden Worte des Interrogators förmlich auf. Schlangenartig anmutend dreht er seinen Kopf und starrt Heinrix regungslos an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, who had been engrossed in his own thoughts, springs to life at the Interrogator's frenzied words. He turns his head with snake-like grace and stares unblinkingly at Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, versunken in seiner eigenen Gedankenwelt, wacht durch die wütenden Worte des Interrogators förmlich auf. Schlangenartig anmutend dreht er seinen Kopf und starrt Heinrix regungslos an.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, que había estado sumido en sus pensamientos, reacciona al oír las imprecaciones del interrogador. Vuelve la cabeza con la elegancia de una víbora y observa a Heinrix sin pestañear siquiera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, who had been engrossed in his own thoughts, springs to life at the Interrogator's frenzied words. He turns his head with snake-like grace and stares unblinkingly at Heinrix.{/n}

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Öncesinde kendi kendine düşüncelere dalmış olan Marazhai, Sorgucu'nun öfkeyle konuşmasını duyunca dikkat kesiliyor. Yılanı andıran bir zarafetle başını çevirip gözünü kırpmaksızın Heinrix'e bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, who had been engrossed in his own thoughts, springs to life at the Interrogator's frenzied words. He turns his head with snake-like grace and stares unblinkingly at Heinrix.{/n}
